inputs.name: PETDICOMPath
inputs.description: Input path to a directory containing a PET volume containing DICOM header information for SUV computation

inputs.name: PETVolume
inputs.description: Input PET volume for SUVbw computation (must be the same volume as pointed to by the DICOM path!).

inputs.name: VOIVolume
inputs.description: Input label volume containing the volumes of interest

inputs.name: ColorTable
inputs.description: Color table to to map labels to colors and names

inputs.name: OutputCSV
inputs.description: A table holding the output SUV values in comma separated lines, one per label. Optional.

inputs.name: OutputLabel
inputs.description: List of labels for which SUV values were computed

inputs.name: OutputLabelValue
inputs.description: List of label values for which SUV values were computed

description: Computes the standardized uptake value based on body weight. Takes an input PET image in DICOM and NRRD format (DICOM header must contain Radiopharmaceutical parameters). Produces a CSV file that contains patientID, studyDate, dose, labelID, suvmin, suvmax, suvmean, labelName for each volume of interest. It also displays some of the information as output strings in the GUI, the CSV file is optional in that case. The CSV file is appended to on each execution of the CLI.
name: PET Standard Uptake Value Computation
label: PET Standard Uptake Value Computation
